import React from 'react'; const ClientSection = () => { const clients = [ { imgSrc: "images/client1.jpg", name: "Moana Michell", quote: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet." }, { imgSrc: "images/client2.jpg", name: "Mike Hamell", quote: "Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt." }, { imgSrc: "images/client3.jpg", name: "John Doe", quote: "Consectetur adipiscing elit." }, { imgSrc: "images/client4.jpg", name: "Anna Smith", quote: "Ut labore et dolore magna aliqua." } ]; return (

What Says Our Customers

{clients.map((client, index) => (

{client.quote}

{client.name}

magna aliqua

))}
); }; export default ClientSection;
